Title: Authorizes the village of Saltaire, county of Suffolk, to impose a tax on real estate transfers and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
Summary: Authorizes the board of trustees of the village of Saltaire in the county of Suffolk to adopt a local law imposing a 2% tax on real estate transfers for ten years to lessen the real property tax burden and fund infrastructure improvements; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add Art 31-H §§1449-aaaaaa - 1449-pppppp, Tax L; add §5-532-a, Vil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the village law, in relation to authorizing the village of Saltaire, county of Suffolk, to impose a tax on real estate transfers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
